page.text: 26 Kingfisher Ct. Marlboro, NJ 07746 . 732-598-5494 . SDRintel@gmail.com
To enhance my knowledge and further develop my skills and talents in your establishment
for the benefit of the company as well as my personal and professional growth.

i.b: BNL Enterprises and Jelly Jar Photography Marlboro, NJ

page.text: Through the Graphic Design Position I have gained numerous responsibilities, which include:
•Design Marketing Materials including posters, flyers, magnets and trade show banners.
•Design photography products including calendars, mugs, holiday greeting cards, and bookmarks.
•Use Konica Minolta press printer to print samples of proofs and flyers for proofreading.
•Use Photoshop to retouch flaws and imperfections in school portraits. Edit and extend class
photo backgrounds.
•Use Kodak DP2 to generate class and whole school composites.
•Design and update ID card layouts. Generate and print ID cards.
•Use computer macros to code image and text nodes to link to correct data and images for photography
products and proofs.
•Use InDesign to Design picture day order forms and proofs. Package InDesign files to prepare for press.
•Communicate with clients through to assure projects are completed timely and accurately.
•Participate in daily production meetings to communicate flow of project deadlines.
•Maintain tight deadlines using company tracking system.
Design promotional material for various media kits and in-magazine advertisements. Created a
typographic guide to refer to for headline typefaces. Created decals and certificates for achievements of
advertisers. Research photography for covers and in house designed advertisements.
Create various invitations to satisfy the client’s need. Push the creative boundaries in the creation of
invitations and giveaways.

text.i: Tuff Enough Merchandise South Amboy, NJ

page.text: Use inspiring quotes, sayings, and words to design shirts. Assist in design and updating of website.
Design and research marketing products such as business cards, postcards and t-shirts targeting children
and parents interested in Video game design. Communicate with vendors to order apparel.
Edit wedding photos by adjusting color and lighting. Create slideshow using iPhoto for guests to view
during the reception.

text.i: Picture Us Perfect Photography Marlboro, NJ

page.text: Photograph candids of Bar/Bat Mitvah guests. Use greenscreen software to edit photographs. Frame and
distribute portraits to guests in a timely manner. Set up red carpets, green screen, and step & repeat
backdrops as per client’s request.
S
BFA West Chester University of Pennsylvania, 2009
Major: Graphic Design Minor: Art History
Graduated Cum Laude
Typography I & II, Advertising Design, Logo Design,
Package Design, Interactive Design, Digital Design
I & II, Introduction to Lightroom, Marketing
Quark, InDesign, Photoshop, Illustrator, Flash, Kodak Digital Production 2, Imagematch
and Microsoft Office. Working Knowledge of Dreamweaver and Visual Basic.
